properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
TWO VESSELS, 1000 PERSONS ON BOARD, ONE DISABLED
AND TAKING ON WATER, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
IN 33-16N 012-34E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 39 06 592 2737, 39 065 908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
